text: Civil War Yang Aiyuan (楊愛源) (1886- 2 January 1959) was a KMT general from Shanxi. From 1928 to 1930, Yang was the first chairman of the government of Chahar, a newly formed province of the Republic of China. In 1937, as a general of the KMT, he played an active part in the Battle of Taiyuan and the Battle of Xinkou. He died in 1959 in Taiwan. ==References== *Yang Aiyuan at Rulers.org *Chinese administrative divisions at Rulers.org Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Shanxi Category:People of the Northern Expedition Category:1886 births Category:1959 deaths Category:People from Xinzhou
title: Yang Aiyuan
